official_title: To designate the Federal building under construction at 600 State Street in New Haven, Connecticut, as the "Merrill S. Parks, Jr., Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building under construction at 600 State Street in New Haven, Connecticut, as the Merrill S. Parks, Jr., Federal Building.
